plugins.name: dotnet-tdd
plugins.description: Test-Driven Development plugin for .NET following TDD, SOLID, DRY, KISS, YAGNI, and CQS principles

plugins.name: business-analyst
plugins.description: Senior Business Analyst plugin for requirements gathering, codebase analysis, stakeholder interviews, and SRS document generation

plugins.name: node-tdd
plugins.description: Test-Driven Development plugin for Node.js/TypeScript with SOLID principles, clean code practices, and functional patterns

plugins.name: dotnet-developer
plugins.description: General .NET development workflow with automated validation through build, test, and static analysis quality gates

plugins.name: workshop-facilitator
plugins.description: Workshop facilitation plugin for design thinking and brainstorming with exploration tracking, backtracking, and documentation of explored and uncharted territory

plugins.name: infra
plugins.description: Infrastructure troubleshooting plugin for diagnosing and resolving issues across GitHub Actions, Railway, Supabase, and Postgres. Focuses on log analysis, error pattern recognition, and proactive health monitoring.

plugins.name: flow-workflow
plugins.description: Lightweight meta-orchestrator that leverages your plugin ecosystem through capability-based routing, with simplified commands (5), consolidated state files (2), and smart continuation
